title: Save up to $700 in this week's Dell XPS deals - prices start at just $899
author: tabitha-baker
article: Dell XPS deals can save you up to $700 right now, with some hefty discounts sitting across a range of premium configurations. That's not all, though. We're seeing prices on some powerful machines dropping as low as $899.99 right now. That's a $450 saving on the touchscreen Dell XPS 13, and things get even better once you take a look at the full spec sheet.

With a 10th generation i7 processor at the helm you're not getting Intel's latest chip here, but there's plenty of power in the hexacore CPU. Combine that with 16GB RAM, a 512GB SSD and the InfinityEdge touchscreen panel and the fantastic value of this Dell XPS deal shines through.

However, if you're going for the big bucks savings, this 2-in-1 Dell XPS 13 is the way to go. A $700 discount brings the final price of this convertible laptop down to $1,399.99 from a $2,099.99 MSRP. That's a lot of cash staying in the bank, and while you're keeping the 10th gen i7 processor and 16GB RAM here, you're upgrading your storage to 1TB. We usually see these 2-in-1 configurations carrying a hefty premium, so getting additional flexibility features in here really pays off as well.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more Dell XPS prices in your region.

If you're after something a little cheaper, you'll find all the best prices on Inspiron machines in our roundup of the best Dell laptop deals. Or, check out the best MacBook sales for Apple's answer to the luxury ultrabook. However, for more brands take a look at the latest cheap laptop deals from all around the web.
